About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Hi, I am MD Mizanur Rahman Rony, graduated from BRAC University on CSE(Computer Science and Engineering) and former-intern in DataSoft Ltd Bangladesh. I am interested in working with web development, machine learning with python and Software development. I have done a few frontend and backend projects for my academic and professional purpose. Moreover, I have worked on a fun project with my friends to develop a dynamic blog site named "SecureBangla". I have tried to solve some programming problems given in URI online judge. Which helped me to increase my programming skills. You can find the detail information in the “My Work” section.

Internship

Software Developer(Angular)

From 1st June to 31st August, I was an internt in DataSoft Ltd Bangladesh and responsible for writing efficient and optimized codes to add new features. There I was working on a big project for a very renowned mobile banking solution in Bangladesh. The project maintained agile methodology.

CRUD Application

Front-end Developer(Angular)

CRUD determines four basic actions on the data which are Create, Read, Update and Delete.I worked on this project to clear my concepts about Angular framework. More over, in this project I have used API to perform the basic actions like create, read, update and delete.

SecureBangla Network

frontend designer

This is a dynamic blog site. I along with my friends started a fun project where we can share our tech experiences and networking solutions. I worked as a frontend developer here. I got the resourses from internet to develop this.

IMDb server

backend developer

This an accademic project of mine for database course. I have done the signin, signup and edit user part using PHP.

IOS calculator

ios developer

I made this app after completeing a training course conducted by a2i government project. This a fun app where people can get multiple calculator. I used the training resourses and internet to bult this app.

Hate speech detection from social networking post

data visualization & twitter data puller

This is our thesis project where I have contributed the data visualization and manually data pulling from twitter. I have used python to do this job.
